name: Chesstopia III
description:
The saga concludes - but, this time, it's for real... Is there chess in the afterlife?

A gamebook written in Twine.

This is the third and final episode of the Chesstopia series (Chesstopia III). It is recommended that you play the first episode (Chesstopia) and the second episode (Chesstopia II) before you play this one.
